TopicTitle: [Video] Tutorial - Your first two Career Mode Missions

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Based on the number of threads on how to start with career mode, what to do, and how to get science, I thought I would throw together a tutorial for career mode. This tutorial covers your first two missions - how to build ships for them, launch them, gather science, return safely, and spend your points.

Good luck!

Very comprehensive, concise, and well-explained. Well done

I agree with your instructional philosophy: My own personal philosophy as far as concerns teaching someone something new is "Consistency before efficiency": Make sure they understand what they're doing enough that they can repeat the basics, then build on that for advanced techniques.

I also like the way you sow the seeds for other concepts by weaving them into your discussion without straying too far from the main topic.

The blooper reel is a nice touch, too
Nice vid very helpful and the blooper reel was way funny thx

Thanks! I loved that blooper reel - I had way more useless footage than useful stuff, too bad the Credits are only about 45 seconds long. Can't take myself too seriously, though - especially when using "authoritative-instructor-voice". lol.
